name: Log Roll
summary: You shuffle your feet to dislodge the surface beneath you or otherwise cause your opponent to become unsteady.
description:
You shuffle your feet to dislodge the surface beneath you or otherwise cause your opponent to become unsteady. Attempt an Acrobatics check against the adjacent creatureâ€™s Reflex saving throw DC. On a success, the creature falls. On a critical failure, you fall.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
